long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Load terms from Quizlet into a 3rd party website to allow for unlimited multiple choice questions with smart options for numbers and T/F questions. It's similar to the Learn mode but without the restrictions. Simply find a set and press the QuizLoader button to open.

NOT AFFILIATED WITH QUIZLET
